alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 15 at 9:37PM MST until March 15 at 11:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 937 PM MST, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Wickenburg. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. Portions of Vulture Mine and Jack Burden Roads are closed due to flooding. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wickenburg. This includes the following streams and drainages... Hartman Wash, Cemetery Wash, Monarch Wash, San Domingo Wash, Hassayampa River, Flying E Wash, Sols Wash and Martinez Wash. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Arroyos, streams, and rivers can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
